participant_1.background:
My parents were always supportive of my wild ways.
i ve had the same job for 8 years.
my dad was a preacher.
i love the color pink.
i will be moving to san diego in two months.

participant_2.background:
I'm happy as a human, even with my asthma.
i have flown out of the country.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.
I try to look professional, but I'm not too concerned about my appearance.
I am an adult male who enjoys eating meat and spending time with my family and friends.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Not much, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks. I'm getting ready to move to San Diego in two months.
Oh, that's exciting! I've never been to San Diego, but I've heard good things about it.
Yeah, it's supposed to be a great city. I'm looking forward to exploring it.
I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun. Do you know anyone there?
Not really, but I'm sure I'll make some friends once I get there.
Well, I hope you have a good time in San Diego!
Thanks, I appreciate it!
No problem. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool. I've always been interested in programming, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not too hard to learn. There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started.
Yeah, I've heard that. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to go hiking, biking, and swimming. I also like to read and watch movies.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great. It's always nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things you do.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad we met.
Me too.
